description:
The old is thrown away, a man delivers a letter for a water god, and a fake samurai gets lucky.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ubasute Mountain / The Letterbearer of the Water God / The Lucky Samurai
Ubasute Yama / Mizu no Kami no Fumitsukai / Un no Yoi ni Waka Samurai
うばすて山 / 水の神の文使い / 運のよいにわか侍
